====== Theme ======


===== About =====
A ''theme'' designs your entire [[:docs:app:app|website app]].



===== Default theme =====

It supports the following features:

  * [[docs:utility:bootstrap|Last bootstrap version (5)]]
  * [[docs:styling:bootstrap|Custom Bootstrap Stylesheet (create and add your own)]]
  * [[docs:performance:cdn|Serve the Bootstrap files by default from a CDN]]
  * Supports several [[docs:layout:page:page|page layout]] and 4 [[docs:layout:page:slot|slots]]:
      * [[docs:layout:page:side_slot|Sidebar]] (left)
      * [[release:deprecated:sidekick_slot|Sidekickbar]] (right)
      * [[docs:layout:page:header_slot|Headerbar]] (top)
      * [[docs:layout:page:footer_slot|Footerbar]] (bottom)
  * [[docs:layout:page:railbar|Railbar Menu (Page, User Site) with a private option]]
  * Support [[docs:app:tagline|tagline]]
  * [[docs:styling:scale|Size Scale configuration (font and spacing)]]
  * [[howto:getting_started:6_favicon|Favicon]]: Recognized the [[howto:getting_started:6_favicon|favicons]]  (included ''android-chrome-192x192.png'')
  * [[docs:utility:shortcut]]
